paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Tonnoiria
Malloch 1929a : 98
. Type species,
Tonnoiria palliseta Malloch 1929
, by original designation. Gender feminine.
Malloch 1932 : 215
[ Marquesas Isl., notes undescribed species from Guam ];
Neave 1940b : 508
[nomenclator];
Malloch 1942 : 209
[as synonym of
Czernyola
];
Hennig 1952 : 227
[discussion of immature stages in Clusiidae ];
Steyskal & Sasakawa 1966 : 244
[key, Micronesia ];
Steyskal 1968 : 87
[priority of
Tonnoiria Malloch
over
Tonnoiria Parent
( Dolichopodidae )].
